summary.para: Receives import notification for every file and directory item imported from an optical medium.

param.name: object
param.para: Pointer to an interface of a file system image object to which data is being imported.

param.name: fileSystem
param.para: Type of the file system currently being imported. For possible values, see the enumeration type.

param.name: currentItem
param.para: A string containing the name of the file or directory being imported at the moment.

param.name: importedDirectoryItems
param.para: The number of directories imported so far.

param.name: totalDirectoryItems
param.para: The total number of directories to be imported from the optical medium.

param.name: importedFileItems
param.para: The number of files imported so far.

param.name: totalFileItems
param.para: The total number of files to be imported from the optical medium.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Notifications are sent in response to calling one of the following methods for importing a file system.
UpdateImport method receives import notifications from ISO9660, Joliet and UDF file systems. A notification is sent:

item.description: Once after every individual imported file.
Once before every directory import begins.

remarks.para: The totalFileItems parameter of an UpdateImport event is always set to (-1) for ISO9660 and Joliet file systems, because of the difficulty quickly and accurately determining the total number of files in an ISO9660/Joliet file system prior to import.
Import notifications are generated only for files and directories, and not for associated named streams.
If the currentItem is a directory, it contains a back slash '' at the end.

summary.para: Use this interface to receives notifications regarding the current file system import operation.

remarks.para: This interface supports import notifications for ISO9660, Joliet and UDF file systems.
